topics.body: So at work we were all watching the arrival of the victims of the crash at Eindhoven airport and how they got carried to their respective cars, then this one asshole decides he wants coffee, turns on the noisy machine and stirs the coffee for a good minute, pissing everybody off. He left early. He was probably shunned or sent home by his supervisor.
